website_summaries.verdict: One of the top indoor grills in its price range. Gives meats a nice sear, is easy to clean, and leaves no lingering smell after use.
pros: Lack of smoke makes it a great option for those who live in areas that prohibit charcoal grills
Large grease catcher and dishwasher-friendly, removable cooking plate make this grill a delight to clean
cons: It’s not a grill you can open and close multiple times while cooking without lowering the temperature

customer_reviews.title: Read these words...
customer_reviews.text: Forget all the negative reviews on this product and listen to your girl over here. I love this grill. I clean it immediately after use. I use only Dawn and warm water. I spray Pam to better protect the grill. Get you one. Follow instructions. Take care of it properly because that's how you maintain longevity.
customer_reviews.author: clutch_the_pearls

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS GRILL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I love this grill. Recently moved into city and can't use my grill so thought I'd give this a try. Man, it's amazing how well this works considering what it is and what it costs. I really can't see why anyone would have ANYTHING negative to say about it. No, it's not a Traeger Grill and clearly has its limits but take a look at the photos of the first two meals I cooked on it... they looked fantastic and tasted even better. Seriously, if you've been on the fence about this grill get off and just buy it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AdventureChuck

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 2nd floor apt so I couldn't have a gas grill. I liked the price and reviews of this product. It took longer to cook through the meat than indicated but always turned out wonderful, until 5 months later. It now doesn't heat anywhere high enough to grill successfully. Now I'm afraid to order any indoor grill as most of the one star reviews for most brands appear to be this same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fills my house with SMOKE :(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this grill BUT it fills my house with SMOKE every time. So, if I throw 2 burgers on it, I have to leave my windows and door wall open because my entire house fills with white smoke from grilling. I do like that it cooks perfectly juicy burgers but I cannot deal with thick smoke that prevents me from breathing every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two important facts
customer_reviews.text: 1. You must unplug in order to turn it off. 2. Nothing is included to tell you what temp to use to cook various foods. This is an item that is not for a first timer like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Julia T. Stout

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this item. I have a George Foreman and this grill worked just like that. I was hoping that after reading the item description it would work more like an outside grill without the gas. Now I have to pay for returning it.
customer_reviews.author: wendy crow

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months and seller did not respond to my email
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Vigil

customer_reviews.title: I cooked a 1" sirloin for 5 minutes on each side & it came out a perfect medium rare
customer_reviews.text: I used this grill for the first time last night. I cooked a 1" sirloin for 5 minutes on each side & it came out a perfect medium rare. It was delicious & clean up was so easy. I recommend this for single people, couples, & anyone with a small yard or disinterest in sweating over a hot grill outside.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: ... have grilled burgers on a snowy Saturday afternoon was fantastic!.
customer_reviews.text: I finally pulled the grill out to use this weekend when my grands came over ----to have grilled burgers on a snowy Saturday afternoon was fantastic!...Our home patted thick burgers cooked much better than I ever expected!!......They were a huge hit with the boys!....Then I grilled steaks the next day and they were absolutely delicious!!!!!.....I'm using my grill again tonight, to grill chops and veggie's ..........I think, I can safely say, I've put away my other pots, pans, and skillets - This grill is very easy to assemble and very easy to clean after use!..............Best investment - I'll be purchasing again for my sons....❥....❥.....
customer_reviews.author: K-unek

customer_reviews.title: Love it but smaller cooking space than I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job grilling and impressive grill marks, I only wish it was larger. Bought it to replace Weber Q-1000 because we grew tired of carrying around and filling 20lb propane tanks and cleaning the weber. BUT, the new Hamilton Beach has about a 40% smaller cooking area. Fine for two people but not large enough to handle a cookout with guests. Cleanup is amazing but still might be forced to buy the MUCH more expensive electric weber ;-( P.S. used a Laser Infrared Thermometer Temperature Gun and the stated temps on the dial are very accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Discovery

customer_reviews.title: NICE GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill that doesnt take up too much space on the countertop. Amazingly grills pork chops and hamburgers just like an outdoor grill. No stick surface. Easy cleanup because most of it goes in the dishwasher. We use it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: CHI MOMTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not working as described, taking too long to cook items
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled so far. The "hot heat" many reviewers are raving about, is NOT happening. For example, 1 piece of corn, preheated for 10 minutes 350, corn is only supposed to cook for 10-12 minutes, turning in between, at the 5 minute mark, barely cooked, turned, no way it will be done in 12 minutes. Cooked Chicken per the explicit instructions, took 20 minutes LONGER than directions dictated. Unit has one more chance and then it's going back, not sure what the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: Michelerp

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Took it out the box and threw it away thinking highly of this smokeless grill due to reviews, but come to find out the following day I actually tried it I was very disappointed that I had to keep it since I threw away original packaging. Bad purchase, the “smokeless indoor grill” produces just as much smoke as an outside grill and no matter what I tried the meat gets stuck badly in grill and burns it quickly rather than cook
customer_reviews.author: TiffAlv

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but didn't last long. Issues staying hot and coating strips off during cleaning
customer_reviews.text: From the get go we could only get things to really cook on sear. Any other setting just didn't get hot enough. I didn't complain because as long as it was on sear my food was coming out beautiful. But unfortunately in just 6 months of use some issues have developed. Its no longer getting as hot and when we clean it the black protective coating on the grill is stripping off. Wish it had lasted longer!
customer_reviews.author: Mikael Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as described
customer_reviews.text: It can not grill. The meat looks like boiled and it gets dry from staying on the grill very long time. The picture showing glilled lines on the meat is illusion. Not true. Used it once and will not use it again. The power is not enough to grill effectively meat. I am sorry you don't offer minus 5 stars. It doens't worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Toy Grill
customer_reviews.text: It's like a toy grill. The stainless steel is thin as aluminum foil. It feels cheap and like it's going to break. Doesn't get hot enough. Slow. Takes forever. Not remotely close to outdoor gas grill, and not even related to outdoor charcoal grill. One step better then no grill. All these great reviews must be paid for. All you get are good grill marks ..that's it.
customer_reviews.author: neil Herschkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to purchase a george forman tabletop indoor grill...however the GF grill plates are very small and barely hold 3 burgers at a time!..so i decided to take a chance with Hamilton...i was a little disappointed it wasn't a press grill when i recieved it (my fault for not reading) but I gave it a try and so happy I did...it cooks so well!!! And it holds 5 big size burgers at a time or 6 small/medium size burgers and cooks in 8 minutes tops! I followed the guidelines in the handbook for cooking and it made everything to perfection. I absolutely love this grill!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Grill
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love grilled steaks, pork chops, chicken and burgers. I have had two George Foreman grills but stopped using them after a while because food didn't taste very grilled and the whole smashing thing just wasn't that appealing. Since receiving this grill we use it at least several times a week. I do everything of sear because I like a very high heat. Steaks turn out great. We live in an apartment and very little smoke is emitted. Clean up is very easy and everything with the exception of the heating unit is washable. I can't speak to the durability because we haven't had it that long but I'm hoping that it lasts a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: CampGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill, but be buy the supplies to clean it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday, made some burgers on it, they came out perfect. But, the grill is very hard to clean in between the wholes. Buy a scrub brush or use aluminum on the grill element to avoid having to destroy your sponge on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nks

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I am an 80 year old widow and I thought I was done with grilling because of my situation! But then I found this indoor grill, read the reviews and ordered it. I used it for the first time tonight. I grilled a T-bone steak for myself and it was not only easy to use and easy to clean, but, the steak turned out delicious, too! I highly recommend this grill!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Blau

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have a charcoal grill and a propane grill outside. Both of which I don’t use!! So when I seen this small indoor grill I wanted it. Just to see if I could actually grill. The first thing I grilled on it were hamburgers. Hubs said that they were better than his!!!! I’ll take the compliment because his are banging!!!! The grill holds a decent amount of food. I put 4 pre pressed out burgers on there with enough space for them. Easy to take apart. All parts can fit in the dishwasher. The piece with the power cord is easy to wipe down too!!! It is light weight. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JLou

customer_reviews.title: Carrier Left In Rain Box Fell Apart, Was Electrically shocked a day after 2 amps short from death.
customer_reviews.text: Will never purchase grills online, the carrier left this item in the rain and even after drying and letting air dry for over a day, upon first use i was electrically shocked from placing my hand near grill plate, the item pushes 10 amps, 12 amps ur dead , be careful.
customer_reviews.author: 🎅

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It says "smokeless" it is NOT. It smokes just like anything else with a heating element when you add meat to it. It takes forever to get hot, but once it does, it makes a good steak. There's not much to it. A little cheaper than the quality I am used to with Hamilton Beach. Every time I open the cover I get a bit of a steam burn (I have since learned not open it with tongs) as the cover falls backwards, it doesn't have a 'catch" of any kind, to keep it from slamming back, I have to keep it against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: H M

customer_reviews.title: This grill stinks.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where all these great reviews are coming from. Free for reviews? This grill cannot hold a candle to the George Forman grills, it has half the power, at least. Takes forever to heat up, takes forever to cook anything. Even a corn on the cob. It's frigging ridiculous. It's not much better than a heat lamp. I would NEVER buy this piece of garbage again. Don't believe these reviews, it truly sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use a few times before writing an honest review. I’ve cooked steak and chicken now and have started to get the hang of it. It holds temp very well and the lid helps a great deal. It adds perfect grill marks to meat. While it does cook very well the best thing about this is how EASY it is to clean. I take it apart and run it under hot hot water for 5-10 minutes, wash with soapy sponge lightly and done! Very to use and store in my 1 bed room apartment
customer_reviews.author: Westyn bodell

customer_reviews.title: The search for the best indoor grill is over!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love barbecue food! we have a little propane one that we can take to the park since we are in an apartment and they won't let us grill on the deck but now that its cold with lots of snow we needed to bring the grilling indoors, so we seen this one and read the reviews and decided to get it and wow just wow fast delivery and amazing flavor! My burger was cooked just how I like it! The only downside was it smoked a little more than the reviews but I just cook by the stove top and put the fan on and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: great for quick nutritious meals
customer_reviews.text: it's light to lift and put away. cooks quickly without having to use the gas grill outside in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Joan Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic counter top grill
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the greatest things I have ever bought on Amazon. My husband use to do all the outdoor grilling but he has gotten older and the fun is no longer there for him. It's been 2 years since I have had anything cooked on a grill and then I saw this. I have cooked steak, hamburgers, pork chops and shrimp kabobs. The clean up is easy and it is very easy to use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The grill cooks great, but can not give it a good review. I used the grill about 4-5 times on my kitchen island with nothing touching it or anything around it. The side of the grill is now melting , there is a huge dent in the side the only thing that I have cooked on this grill is hamburgers and grilled chicken. It’s stored in a pantry in my house so it’s kept cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: It's fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is the epitome of a three star product. It's fine. I have to max out the heat to cook anything in a remotely acceptable time, it has enough coverage for 4 medium sized chicken breasts or 2 breasts and enough veggies for 2 servings. It's not then toughest to clean, but it also isn't exactly quick. I bought this thing because my apartment complex does not allow grills on outdoor patios. Normally, I'd be doing 90% of my cooking on an outdoor grill. This does an adequate job of replacing it, but I still really miss the outdoor grill.
customer_reviews.author: Sportwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor grill I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: For a family of four, this indoor grill is outstanding in its utility, performance and is dishwasher safe. Very easy clean up since the grill and under tray can go in the dishwasher - the remainder just wipes clean. It is not a large grill, but will fit 4 chicken breasts, or 6 hamburgers. It stores easily on the kitchen counter and we set it on the stove top for grilling. Because of the adjustable temperature control, I like to sear tougher cuts of meat or ribs on high temp and then turn it down for slow cooking. Just hope it lasts for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Laredo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I have bought. The first one lasted about a year before the inside melted randomly. But this one I used once to cook steak on and when taking it apart to clean it i noticed the inside of the grill is already melting. i would not recommend at all! Great idea for an inside grill but how can this not handle 350 for 8 minutes! Such a fire hazard!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Kinda upset.
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this a 5 star, let me explain. I used the searing feature and got a wonderful steak and was really pleased with its performance when cooking. The problem came when I was cleaning the grill. One the right lower side of the frame there was melted plastic, on the left rear lower side of the frame there was another place where the plastic had melted. As far as cooking its a 5 star performance, but finding the melted areas kinds drops it down to about a 3 star. I would say if you can handle a bit of melting plastic, and as far as for cooking your food its great.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy Grill Even for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill because of the great reviews and boy did it love up to them! This grill is super easy to use and cleans great! I'm not someone who uses a real grill at all so even getting this I was a little nervous but it's so easy! Cooks food evenly and tastes delicious
customer_reviews.author: Camizzle222

customer_reviews.title: It's just simply a wonderful kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this grill. I ordered it October 2019 and I absolutely use it at least 3 times a week. It never ever fails me. On the sear setting I get beautiful and tasty grill Mark's on anything I cook.....steaks, chicken breasts, hot dogs, burgers, sausages, zucchini, corn. I use it for everything and it all comes out delicious. It's a breeze to clean and is very lightweight so it's easy to move around. For me, it doesn't smoke at all and I use the sear function more than any other temp setting. I could not be happier with this and consider it one of the better purchases I've made here. Go for it. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Delaware

customer_reviews.title: love this grill
customer_reviews.text: after buying this grill and given it a try that i haven't had any issues with this product for how it does heat up kind of quick cause after trying my salmon patties on this thing that i haven't had to cook them at 350 for how 300 did just fine cause the only thing i would of liked on this grill if the cord on this thing was a bit longer for that being my only issue
customer_reviews.author: thebite

customer_reviews.title: After an year used stoped working
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with my grill purchase. After one year and a half, the grill stops heating properly. I wasn't able to reach a temperature of more than 200F. The actual grill nonstick cover starts pilling of from the plate. Now I have to look for a new one and definitely it'll not be Hamilton!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Todorov

customer_reviews.title: ... using it for a while and it's still functioning great. Easy to use and seems to cook the ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a while and it's still functioning great. Easy to use and seems to cook the food pretty evenly. We like the sear effect and food comes out good. To some of the reviewers, you may think this is too simple and without much other function such as timer. But for a simple indoor grill, it's doing its job fairly well and it takes less than 10 minutes to reach the max heat. After cooking, cleaning is easy as well. I like the fact that all parts can come apart and you can wash/clean everything. It may not be the cheapest option out on the market, but I think it's worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Regular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No smoke indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and not because of anything wrong - I gave my first one to a friend to use and they loved it so much I told them to keep it. I then went online and bought me another one! These are the best indoor grills ever. No smoke, can set the temp to whatever you need, and the food cooks and even shows grill lines. It is the greatest indoor grill ever! I love mine - including the drip pan, which if the meat is juicy, you can even make gravy. Love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase all together
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how easy it was to put it together. It makes cleaning a breeze. It's dishwasher safe but i hand wash it just to preserve the nonstick coating. There is a little booklet attached that includes recommended cooking times. My only complaint is that the cooking time were inaccurate for veggies. Anything under the sear setting takes an eternity to cook. So i only use sear mode. But I'm very happy with it and i think the whole point of getting this grill is to get those cool marks on everything. I love it regardless and use it at least twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Not smokeless
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Make sure you turn the knob all the way to the right in order to get maximum heat. It cooks quickly and evenly. Clean up is a cinch. Make sure you clean the entire unit well if you don’t it will start to smoke and burn anything left on the grill plate. This unit is NOT smokeless. Hence the four star rating.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I've used this grill only once so far. It is replacing a old top and bottom electric grill. This grills only from the bottom and the top keeps the heat inside to help with cooking. It did a great job on a flank steak, though I had to cook it longer than anticipated. I loved that I could take out the grill and the top and put them in the dishwasher. I trust the Hamilton Beach brand because I bought one of their panini presses four years ago and it continues to work great.
customer_reviews.author: P_Haag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take apart and clean. Comes out great from the dishwasher and easy reassemble. Lid must be washed in the sink but gets minimal grease so also very easy to wash. Multiple temperatures to choose from. This replaced a series of Foreman grills that were fine but I like the way this one operates and cleans up. Great for chicken, burgers, fish, hot dogs, or for grilling vegetables. It doesn't take up much room and we set it up on top of the stove when cooking and store it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: FLRL

customer_reviews.title: Good grill for price but not totally smokeless .
customer_reviews.text: The grill works great but does produce smoke as soon as grease etc get into bottom pan . I have it near window to reduce smell in house as well as not wanting my smoke alarms going off . It would be nice if it came with /or if one was also offered to purchase with it .., a small thin bristle brush to clean the grill plate . I had to purchase a baby bottle thin one to get In between grates . The grill is well worth the price though !! I
customer_reviews.author: karyn

customer_reviews.title: Temp is way too low
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to cook meat because the temperature is too low. Even at max setting it takes forever to cook anything. I only use it to drain the fat off meats then I have to put it into the oven to really cook. Taught the cover would help keep the heat in and give it a nice broil but it lets too much heat escape for that. One plus though is that it cleans very easily only three prices. Would have been awesome if it could only cook.
customer_reviews.author: Appollo Scott

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new indoor grill. Read the reviews, compared to other brands, chose this one. Liked it because it had a removable grill piece and a decent sized drip tray. Have already tried boneless chicken breasts and burgers. Neither stuck to the grill base. Took a bit of tweaking to get the temperature correct. Both meats came out perfect. Cleaning wasn't too bad and it cones apart and goes back together easily. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jtap

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor electric grill
customer_reviews.text: I use this grill mainly for grilling steaks and pork chops. I am still adjusting to the temperature control and the grill itself. It's a little smaller grilling area than I like and it takes longer to grill a steak and pork chop than calls for in the cooking directions that come with it. Cleaning is not fun but it is not that difficult to clean when compared to other indoor grills I have owned. It is a good indoor grill for the money.
customer_reviews.author: lily42

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the money!
customer_reviews.text: All the positive reviews are legitimate. It’s a small 1-2 person grill, but works well for my needs. The grill plate is the best feature. Having had a George Foreman, a vintage Farberware and even a Char Broil, I like this one the best. It’s sturdy and very non stick. It’s easy to take apart and reassemble. Even clean up is easy, you don’t need a dishwasher, it’s simple to wash by hand. The drip pan and cover could be a little more substantial, but you get what you pay for. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ask Lola

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love grilled dark meat of chicken which is nearly impossible to find grilled and ready to eat. For that reason I ordered this so I could supply my own. So glad I did! This is so easy to use--turn it on to the temperature you want. So easy to clean: the pan and grill was in the dishwasher. The rest can be wiped clean with a sponge. I marinate the chicken, then cook it. It comes out juicy and delicious. I strongly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Myers Perrine

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great.
customer_reviews.text: Review time for the Hamilton beach electric grill. Have some down time recovering from surgery and the old George Forman was on the way out. Had to make the tuff decision of replacement. After lots of looking ordered this Hamilton beach. Cannot be more pleased. Adjustable temp, stainless, removable hood, grill and juice catcher for easy cleaning and dishwasher safe. Cooked chicken to perfection and kept juices in. Blows the Forman We had away. Closest to outdoor grilling taste wise and the cooking surface is decent. Picked it up on sale for 60 bucks and was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: smokeless
customer_reviews.text: We have been cooking steaks in a skillet and filling the condo up with smoke. I tried the George Forman and the steaks did not taste good. In desperation, I tried the HB indoor grill. It is truly virtually smokeless and cleanup is easy. Everything disassembles and can even be put in the dishwasher. The steaks are not as good as an outside charcoal grill, but they are very good. I love it..........
customer_reviews.author: J. Collen

customer_reviews.title: Indoor grilling without charcoal or gas!
customer_reviews.text: I own this grill and I freaking LOVE it. In fact, I used it to make burgers last night. I live in an apartment, so we can’t have an outdoor grill. I got soooo tired of baked, roasted, and sautéed foods. This indoor grill has made all the difference in my cooking. The heat up time is quick, temps are accurate, and cleanup is super easy. You can just put the grill grate, lid, and grease tray in the dishwasher. It’s not like a George Foreman grill, it doesn’t press your foods or anything, there’s only contact on one side at a time like with a normal grill. Get one, it’s a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: KMartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill for Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! Easy to use! My steak & shrimp cooked amazing on grill with NO Smoke at all in my apt I used only once upon arrival because of the clean up afterwards as the grease gets underneath grill grate. When cleaning be careful not to cut your finger cleaning the bottom of the grill plate. It's best to use a grill brush to clean under grill plate unless you soak & wipe carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Used it many times.
customer_reviews.text: Posted this one on my social media page while cooking some grilled veggies, salmon, shrimp kebab and people are asking what kind it is as they want one too. I chose this over Foreman because it has the real grill ridges that let's the juices drip down in a drip tray (vs soaking the food in some juices as it does in Foreman grill). Love the grill marks on my salmon. Save your money from eating out. Instead take California Fish Grill to your humble abode. Make some home made tartar sauce too. Mayonnaise and relish worked for me. Nom nom nom
customer_reviews.author: HooKedONcsi

customer_reviews.title: Get it!! Healthy option to cooking food
customer_reviews.text: Love! Beautiful grill marks. I love making salmon on it. It is easy to clean and assemble. One down side, the “sear” setting (which is the highest temp) still takes it awhile to cook. I like all my meat to be well-done. I have to cook it a little longer to make sure my meats are completely done. But the sear setting cooks it perfectly on the outside but the inside is not quite done to my liking. Other than that. It’s bomb.com
customer_reviews.author: Tricia W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is perfect for making quick grilled meals. Makes great grilled chicken, steaks, hamburgers, vegetables. Most of what we have cooked has been boneless and makes for a perfect addition to any kitchen. It doesn't replace an outdoor gas or charcoal grill but it's not intended to. Great lil kitchen grill for those busy days when you want to make the family dinner quick and painless. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's handy
customer_reviews.text: I like the grill so far. I have had good luck grilling beef patties, steak and chicken. It really drains the fat. You need to be carefull about over cooking thinner portions, less than half inch. Make sure you wipe off as much marinade you can to avoid messy clean up. It's not easy to clean the grill plates. You can't put cooking spray on them. I find I must wipe them very well after heating them a little and letting them soak in hot sudsy water.
customer_reviews.author: jangoin

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a indoor grill that would be easy to store, clean and handle for hamburgers, veggie and such and finally found it. Its a tad bigger than expected but no complaints I enjoy being able to grill two hamburgers when the kids want them without going outside to fire up the big grill. It heats up fast, super easy to clean with the removable grill and drip pan. The only thing I dislike is that the lid is very flimsy. This would be my only concern.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: If you prefer nice grill marks on your steak
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this grill a few months ago to use during cold winter months when grilling outdoors isn't as convenient. Was a little concerned as to if the kitchen would be filled with smoke, however that hasn't been a problem at all. If you prefer nice grill marks on your steak, the key is to let it preheat for about 15 minutes. Love the fact you can put most of the components in the dishwasher for easy cleanup. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tlbeedy

customer_reviews.title: Black grease on underside of grill element
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill after seeing all of the positive reviews, but noticed that when I received the product, a metallic grease was found on the under side of the removable grill top. I am not sure exactly what this grease like substance was, but I don't like the prospect of cooking my food on a surface that this grease is on. I called customer service and there had been no reports of complaints about noticing this, so I'm not sure if mine was faulty or not. The sponge I used to clean it (third time now) tells the tale.
customer_reviews.author: Tony J

customer_reviews.title: Smokelss in Wichita Falls
customer_reviews.text: I really love this indoor grill. It is smokeless (unless you burn something). I cooked twelve bacon wrapped hamburgers on it (three to four at a time), veges, bread for toast, and other items. The one thing to know is that the grill is a stickless grill but YOU have to wash it by hand to get everything off of it. But the food comes right off when you do. You can put this through the dishwasher - but my dishwasher will not remove anything from the grill. Small price to pay to have grilled food on a winter's day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Manning

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but smokes too much
customer_reviews.text: I've had this grill for a few months now, and have used it several times. EACH time, I preheat the grill as its recommended with the cover down. But it ALWAYS creates alot of smoke. Enough to where it sets off my smoke alarm if I open the lid for too long. I have to turn on my stove vent to prevent it. As far as cooking, it does decent. But it does dry the food out more than I'd like it to at times. Maybe that's more on me, maybe not. Either way, I may be looking elsewhere for another grill of this type.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good grill for your money
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to like this grill as much as I do. I use it at least once a week to grill hamburgers, shrimp, veggies and swordfish. It cooks evenly and in no time. I do think cleaning is a bit of a pain as others suggested, but I use a metal brush on the grate (the one I use for my cast iron skillet) and it gets everything off. Spray your grill with some olive oil spray before you grill and cleanup will be easier. All in all this is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cooking made easy
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could. This is a must in your kitchen. Grill all your meats and veggies ahead. This is a great way to cook especially if you can’t get outside everyday to grill. 3 of the 4 pieces can go in dishwasher. Love mine and use it atleast 3x a week UPDATE: After only owning this for a few months, as much I loved it , it quickly died on me and does not heat up anymore. I'm am quite disappointed in this product now. :( will purchase another one from a different manufacturer next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much like a foreman grill
customer_reviews.text: Similar to a foreman grill, in my opinion, except it only grills on 1 side. It isn't the easiest thing to clean by hand, it has small slits that a sponge doesn't easily get to, but the grill surface is removable and should fit in your dish washer. If you don't clean it right away, it smells pretty gross (like a dirty bbq) after use, in a day or less. But, it dos the job as far as cooking goes, and adds a new way to cook in my appartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually write reviews but this is the BEST indoor grills EVER
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but this is the BEST indoor grills EVER! It makes outdoor grill quality meat, doesn't fill your house with smelly smoke and is super easy to clean. I was able to fit 3 chicken breasts and a bunch of peppers no problem. It's great and totally worth the money! Also has a grill cover similar to an outdoor one you can close between flips. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grenier

customer_reviews.title: this grill is perfect for you
customer_reviews.text: If your only cooking for one or two people.... this grill is perfect for you. It's simple, light weight and easy to clean. So toss out your George Forman grill and get yourself an upgrade ! I tossed out my charcoal & propane grills & use this instead. Heats up fast & grills a mean steak ! Great for veggies too...This would be perfect for an apt. or condo with a small patio or deck.
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: I like to grill several pieces of chicken and turkey burgers ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to grill several pieces of chicken and turkey burgers for healthy eating throughout the week. Because of weather and other reasons, it is not always convenient to use the outside grill. I am very happy with this grill. No smoke in the house, grills quickly, you can cook 4 or more large pieces at a time, and the clean-up is quick and easy (i use a non-stick spray). I was pleasantly surprised. I have had several George Forman's in the past and this one is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty Fifties

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks perfectly, fits on the counter just right & really doesnt take up much space, cleans super easily! Literally dont need to use the scrubby side of the sponge plus that would mess up the whole non stick part. Temperature control is easy. My only complaints really would be that theres no on/off button or switch, you can only plug it in to turn on & unplug to turn off, I guess its not really that big of a deal. Second would be that the cord is kinda short, sometimes I have to rearrange things to reach an outlet. Overall worth the price though!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this grill?
customer_reviews.text: I have grilled everything from chicken to burgers to asparagus to steaks and toasted buns on this grill! I love being able to grill indoors even when I am in pajamas on a rainy day at night. It makes perfect grill marks and cooks more evenly than a charcoal grill. I suggest lining the drip tray with foil to help with cleanup, which is already easy. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: George Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Never get hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst thing I have ever purchased on Amazon. I don't know what is worse, not heating up enough to grill burgers or not being able to get it clean after using. Hand scrubbing or dishwasher could not get it clean and base is full of nooks that are hard to reach even with a paper towel. Grillers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family of 3.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this grill for about 9 months and use 1 or 2x/wk. Hate using outdoor, charcoal grill...going in and out, esp on hot/cold days, precleaning, setting up coals, postcleaning...just a pain in the rear for a few burgers or steaks. This indoor grill does exactly what I need with much less work. I love that it heats up quickly, puts on a great sear, lid closes to stop splatter or to keep warm at lower temp, and it breaks down easily to wash/soak. It can fit about 6 avg size burgers, 3 ribeyes/strips, or 4-5 breasts. Perfect for our family of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The first use I tried grilling a ribeye and asparagus. I set the grill on preheat sear for 10+ minutes. It did not sear the steak and took 35 minutes or more to get the steak medium well turning once. Cleaning in hot soapy dish water isn't as easy as they claim either. I'll keep trying the grill on different foods but I'm not anticipating better results. Not worth the price. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Only grilled once on the grill. But my husband was very impressed. I grilled hamburgers and they tasted just like they was grilled outside on a regular grill. The only thing I would recommend is when you are grilling have the grill next to the exhaust fan so the smoke from the grill can escape. I put water in the pan as suggested but it still got smoky in my kitchen. Buy other than that very pleased with it. Can't wait to grill chicken next.
customer_reviews.author: melissa bishop

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases.
customer_reviews.text: I am so obsessed with this product. It is just PERFECT for what i need. I had always wanted to grill but never got time to set up the outdoor one, which I bought from xmas 2017 and still in the box. This one is so easy to use, the food comes out perfect, and super easy to clean. I made bbq short ribs, then burgers. I bought this just a few weeks ago and am very pleased. Strong recommend it to other people. One of my best purchases for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia C.

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but not anymore!
customer_reviews.text: This little grill is way better than I could've imagined. We live in an apartment where we cannot have a normal grill outside and this thing works wonders. I was mostly worried about it being "smokeless" but I have yet to make one thing that has caused smokiness like pan frying any sort of meat would do. This thing works exactly as advertised and for the price you cannot beat it. Dont waste more time wishing you were grilling when you could be! Cleanup is a breeze whether you do it by hand or in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, however it came very poorly packaged. The lid was all scratched and dinted. It doesn’t effect the products cooking ability, but who wants to buy something banged up? 3 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats the $200+ Grills!!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill beats the $200+ grills we used in the past. We have never had satisfactory results with electric grills before. This grill truly generates the heat for searing! Update: we ran the grill - all of it - through the dish washer many times. Yes, we know you’re not supposed to do that but we are lazy. Also we always kept the grill on patio during rain, ice, and snow. Today it finally gave up. Not bad life for an electric appliance run through in a dishwasher. We just got off Amazon and ordered a new one. $2.00 coupon is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Physics Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Steaks
customer_reviews.text: Easy grill to use. My other indoor grill was too big and it was always an ordeal to clean. This one is not too big and the washable parts fit in my sink and dishwasher. Did a ribeye 6 min on each side and it came out perfect med rare...was hard to do that on my propane grill cause it was either too hot or not hot enough. To clean it off, I used a wet paper towel after it was off but still hot...I ran it up an down the grates with the tongs and it gets all the burnt stuff off easy. Awesome grill; definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It takes up a lot of counter space so if you don't have a place to store it you will a bit aggravated. It does what it says it does. It is easy to clean. Cooks a pretty mean steak. You don't get the smokey flavor like you do on a grill but the house sure smells good while you are cooking! It good for if you like grilling in the summer and the types of food you can grill. You're not messing up a lot of pots and pans. I was pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: seywhut

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't heat up. Just opened it today and it tales 4hours to heat waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect indoor grill for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect indoor grill for 2 people! We've made steaks, chicken, ribs, and burgers and all were delicious!! I didn't care too much for hot dogs made on it using the sear setting. We usually make grilled onion slices or potatoes along side the protein. Wonderful grill!! What sold me on this one was the sear setting and it works beautifully!!
customer_reviews.author: KConrad

customer_reviews.title: It's crap
customer_reviews.text: The connectors to the grill melted and corroded. It worked great for almost a year. If you want long term buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: James Van Huizen

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy my BBQ in winter time.
customer_reviews.text: Snow falling outside, my family is enjoy BBQ indoor with a lot of funs. What can I complain about? Life is good. Thanks for Hamilton Beach to make the life in different. Please, don't need to buy an expensive one with the same function. With Hamilton Beach 25360, I still keep my favorite(taste) of my outdoor BBQ, it is easiest to set up and clean up without any mess. I can't tell what is different between outdoor and indoor, after I grill all my chicken by Asian recipe. My wife says only "WOW", kids always are "busy" with chicken too. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: amazone

customer_reviews.title: keep yo moneys in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: this inside so called grill, is worth just as much as the box its shipped in. The temperature is horrible, it cycles on and off while your meat ends up in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Fooliachki

customer_reviews.title: We love it but it's hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! Pros: Since we live in a condo and the grill its outside and need to take everything downstairs and then upstairs and you know, this grill it's perfect for us. It works like a regular charcoal grill. It doesn't take a lot of space in your cabinets. Cons: it takes a lot of time to clean the grill perfectly with all the grease in between the gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Duki

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on a this, but the reviews were good. One of the best electric appliances I own! It does a terrific job. The first time it heated up took a little while but now it’s fast! Cooked a steak to perfection! Cleanup is a breeze with minimal effort. No smoking! I’m more than pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Glorybelle

customer_reviews.title: badass little grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Didn’t know I needed this now not sure what I ever did without it. Its like having a gas grill you can use indoors without having to go out in the cold. 1000x faster & easier to clean than a George Foreman and cooks better, too. Parts are small and pop right in the dishwasher. Very unlikely I will EVER use my George Foreman ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, cleaning can be meticulous.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and used it. Quite easy to assemble and use. Instruction manual provides temperatures to cook food at and also gives a couple of recipes to try. Grilled some turkey burgers for the family; it didn’t take long and the burgers were nicely done and cooked well. Clean up was a bit more meticulous as you do have to get into the grooves very well so as not to have left over food or residue for next use. Overall satisfied so far with the product and shipping time (ordered on a Sunday and came that Wednesday).
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and set up. Cooks excelleht.
customer_reviews.text: I love my indoor grill. It is easy to use although I have to set it up each time I use it bc I lack top cupboard space. It is pretty easy to clean although the grate takes more cleaning time. The food I cook is done to our liking. Since I cant grill outside during winter months, this is a perfect grilling alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Bikingmary

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great grill! I was a little skeptical at first due to some of the negative reviews but took a chance anyway. This grill exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill!! Made the best grilled burger ever! Perfectly seared, grill marks, cooked to perfection. Grilled a bun while the cheese was melting on the burger. No smoke. Flawless. Easy to clean. The lid comes off easily & easy to re-attach. The non stick surface is perfect. The drip pan caught the extra fat drippings. I would highly recommend this if you are looking for an indoor grilling option. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: EGJINFL

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long!
customer_reviews.text: We've been enjoying this indoor grill. It's great for burgers and chicken. The only issue is that the coating is already coming off and we've used it maybe half a dozen times in the 3 months we've had it. It's not very easy to clean so I've used plastic scrubbers and it takes the coating right off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little grill
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little grill. Since I'm unable to have a traditional outdoor grill this is a perfect middle man. Foods cooked on here do stay nice and juicy and sure do have that grilled food feel and taste. I would recommend getting the oxo electric grill cleaner and this can be a pain to clean between the grates.
customer_reviews.author: Tereasa

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor grilling
customer_reviews.text: I love to grill outside. But during the winter it is almost impossible. With this grill I can do anything on the grill. Grilled shrimp skewers are great! Bar bq chicken is excellent! The only thing I have a problem with is ground beef for hamburgers. Even with buying the lowest fat content, I still get a lot of smoke. Steaks are great. I love this product. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Redrady1

customer_reviews.title: It works as well as any other electric grill.
customer_reviews.text: The problem is, no matter what I grill in it, the food tastes like plastic. Until they come out with a grill that has either a Stainless Steel or Iron grill surface, the food will taste like crap. I'm dumping this off at GoodWill.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory job for a studio efficiency living environment
customer_reviews.text: Without a dishwasher, a bit fussier to clean as one would imagine, and, although my unit has shown smokiness while heating (even with no oils being used), I like that both meats and vegetables can be cooked using one appliance and very quickly. Makes eating healthy still rather easy when you don’t have more elaborate amenities in your living situation.
customer_reviews.author: STEPH J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It’s SO easy to use, clean, assemble/ disassemble. I have a small apartment and it hasn’t caused any smoke or bad smells whatsoever. I’ve cooked salmon on multiple occasions as well as chicken skewers and they always come out great! Would definitely recommend this product if you’re looking for a great quality indoor grill!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Bell

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100% - Most Useful Kitchen Appliance I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing appliance to grace my counter! Surprised by how easy it is to use and clean. I always dry out chicken when cooking but this kept it moist and tender and locked in all the flavor. Good for singles or couples who need smaller portions. Haven’t had any trouble with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Biomajor

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Grilling.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Montana. I love grilled food but can't grill in the winter. This item filled my needs for that. Steaks brats and pork are great. Chicken wasn't as good. Chicken thighs that is. I put bbq sauce on them after I cooked then for an hour. It helped. Cleanup even after the cause was very easy. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kelley

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Electric Indoor Searing Grill Removable Easy-To-Clean Nonstick Plate, 6-Serving, Extra-Large Drip Tray, Stainless Steel (25360)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Searing GrillEnjoy outdoor grilled flavor anytime you want, regardless of the weather. The searing grill’s high-heat searing temperature locks in juices and flavor, giving your meat better taste, texture, and appearance. Unique hooded design helps keep in flavor to give your food that authentic outdoor grilled taste. There's no messing with propane, charcoal, or lighter fluid, so cooking couldn't be easier. Simply plug it in and turn the temperature dial all the way up to sear. When it reaches the high-heat searing temperature of 450 degrees, the green preheat light will glow. Now you’re ready to sear steaks, burgers, pork chops, or fish fillets to perfection. If you want to grill food that doesn't need to sear first, the searing grill has an adjustable temperature dial for lower heat.
feature_bullets: Locks in juices and flavors: Sear at 450 degrees or use adjustable temperature dial to grill at lower heat for optimal grilling results

Enjoy grilling all year long: This indoor grill with hood has a high searing heat that locks in juices and flavors, and lid closes to give you signature grill marks; Serves up to 6 with 118 square inch grilling surface
Easy to clean: Indoor grill hood, plate, and extra-large drip tray are all removable and dishwasher safe
less mess: Extra-large drip tray catches juices so they don't spill on your counter and it's dishwasher safe for easy cleaning
Power and preheat lights: Eliminate guesswork while using your electric grill
Cooks more than steaks, Bbq and burgers: Grill chicken, fish, pizza, vegetables, fruit and more. also great for paleo and Keto diets.
Powerful 1200 watts and 1 year limited warranty.
Dimensions: 12.4 inches L x 16.7 inches W x 6.8 inches H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,673 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
